channel.title: Poetries on Meet Chandershekhar
channel.description: Recent content in Poetries on Meet Chandershekhar

item.title: Internet
item.description: I am absorbed on the net Seeing the whole world Yet chained I remain And watch the time go Ignoring family and friends To live my life virtual I truly remain unhappy Trapped in this fake realm At last my phone goes out Freeing me of this burden Bringing light to my soul To show me the real world

item.title: Reality
item.description: The peace of silence is all but forgotten Giving time for me to ponder my thoughts Allowing me to see what is not noticed Bringing light to what I thought was gone I now see the truth of my worldâ€™s reality No longer do I remain so blind to atrocity Now is my time to take a form action And show the world the the power of unity

item.title: Stress
item.description: Dungeons of stress chain me Eating my freedom away At last I take time to relax To ease my ghastly pain And healing my lasting wounds Now letting me be away of fray The calm soothes my soul Making me feel reborn I feel ready to go out And face challenges of the world

item.title: UT
item.description: The city mighty of Austin Is home to my school I visit here often Cause my university is a jewel Home to the Longhorns of UT A school that is also an emotion Working hard to get my degree But that is not my real notion To meet people in my 4 years Giving me jolly tales to tell later Friends part ways as the future nears But our memories remain greater

item.title: Bhagwan
item.description: Hum naachate hain uske ishaaron par Azad hain hum nahi Issme hain humare khushi Kyon ki woh ho sabase mahaan Hum usse mahasoos nahi kar paate Phir bhee woh hai yahin Surarakshit hain hum tabhee Jab tak hain uske saath

item.title: Social Isolation
item.description: People wait for their chance To go out and have a dance Yet he still prowls in wait Waiting of your date Nothing is more morbid Than COVID of the horrid He journeys to the lung And there remains clung May all proceed with caution Or fight him as an option
